00025 #ifndef ECFILECONFIG_H
00026 #define ECFILECONFIG_H
00027 
00028 #include <wx/fileconf.h>
00029 #include <wx/filename.h>
00030 #include <wx/utils.h>
00031 
00032 #include "MD4Hash.h"        // Needed for CMD4Hash
00033 #include "OtherFunctions.h" // Needed for GetConfigDir()
00034 
00035 
00039 inline wxString FinalizeFilename(const wxString filename)
00040 {
00041     if (wxStrchr(filename, wxFileName::GetPathSeparator()) == NULL) {
00042         return GetConfigDir() + filename;
00043     }
00044     if ((filename.GetChar(0) == '~') && (filename.GetChar(1) == wxFileName::GetPathSeparator())) {
00045         return wxGetHomeDir() + filename.Mid(1);
00046     }
00047     return filename;
00048 }
00049 
00050 
00057 class CECFileConfig : public wxFileConfig {
00058     public:
00059 
00060         CECFileConfig(const wxString& localFilename = wxEmptyString)
00061             : wxFileConfig(wxEmptyString, wxEmptyString, FinalizeFilename(localFilename),
00062                 wxEmptyString, wxCONFIG_USE_LOCAL_FILE | wxCONFIG_USE_RELATIVE_PATH)
00063             {}
00064 
00073         bool    ReadHash(const wxString& key, CMD4Hash *hash)
00074         {
00075             wxString sHash;
00076             bool retval = wxFileConfig::Read(key, &sHash, wxEmptyString);
00077             if (sHash.IsEmpty()) {
00078                 hash->Clear();
00079             } else {
00080                 hash->Decode(sHash);
00081             }
00082             return retval;
00083         }
00084 
00093         bool    WriteHash(const wxString& key, const CMD4Hash& hash)
00094         {
00095             return wxFileConfig::Write(key, hash.IsEmpty() ? wxString(wxEmptyString) : hash.Encode());
00096         }
00097 };
00098 
00099 #endif /* ECFILECONFIG_H */
